text: Caprino Alendy (24 October 1952 â€“ 6 November 2020) was a Surinamese politician. He was Chairperson of Brotherhood and Unity in Politics (BEP) from 1987 until 2012. Alendy was Vice Chairperson of the National Assembly between 2005 and 2010. Alendy was born in Benanoe, Sipaliwini. On 6 November 2020, Alendy died after a short illness at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Educators Category:Surinamese politicians
title: Caprino Alendy
